entrepreneurs.name: Dyumna Madan
entrepreneurs.bio: Co-founder of Project Clay, a startup invested by Anupam Mittal on Shark Tank India.

entrepreneurs.name: Aadit Palicha
entrepreneurs.bio: Co-founder and CEO of Zepto, a pioneering 10-minute grocery delivery service valued at over $1 billion.

entrepreneurs.name: Kaivalya Vohra
entrepreneurs.bio: Co-founder and CTO of Zepto, a unicorn startup revolutionizing quick commerce in India.

entrepreneurs.name: Shivom Sood
entrepreneurs.bio: Co-founder of Project Clay, creating innovative tech solutions and featured on Shark Tank India.

entrepreneurs.name: Reuel Kharbudnah
entrepreneurs.bio: Founder of EcoBricks, a company focused on creating sustainable building materials from recycled plastic.

entrepreneurs.name: Lahunlang Sohliya
entrepreneurs.bio: Founder of a venture dedicated to converting vehicles to be wheelchair-accessible, improving mobility for people with disabilities.

entrepreneurs.name: Keshav Reddy
entrepreneurs.bio: Founder of Equal, a fintech platform aimed at making financial products accessible and equitable.

entrepreneurs.name: Tanushri Biyani
entrepreneurs.bio: Founder of Anaar, a contemporary fashion brand known for its vibrant prints and designs.

entrepreneurs.name: Kishan Panpalia
entrepreneurs.bio: Founder and CEO of Pepper Content, a content marketing platform that connects businesses with creators.

entrepreneurs.name: Raj Shamani
entrepreneurs.bio: Founder of House of X, a media and content creation house. Also a renowned keynote speaker.

entrepreneurs.name: Nikita Tiwari
entrepreneurs.bio: Co-founder of NEERX, a tech startup focused on innovative solutions for water conservation and management.

entrepreneurs.name: Harsh Agrawal
entrepreneurs.bio: Co-founder of NEERX, working on technology-driven projects to solve water scarcity issues.

entrepreneurs.name: Rithika Pandey
entrepreneurs.bio: A multidisciplinary artist and entrepreneur whose work has been featured in international publications and fashion weeks.

entrepreneurs.name: Udit Singhal
entrepreneurs.bio: Founder of Glass2Sand, an initiative that crushes glass bottles into sand to reduce landfill waste and conserve natural resources.

entrepreneurs.name: Akshay Makar
entrepreneurs.bio: Co-founder involved in building the House of X media and content ecosystem.

entrepreneurs.name: Ankit Alok Bagaria
entrepreneurs.bio: Co-founder of WittyFeed, one of India's largest viral content platforms, which was later acquired.

entrepreneurs.name: Abhi Gawri
entrepreneurs.bio: Co-founder of WittyFeed, a digital media giant that redefined viral content in India.

entrepreneurs.name: Viraj Khanna
entrepreneurs.bio: Creative lead and co-founder at House of X, focusing on brand strategy and content creation.

entrepreneurs.name: Spriha Biswas
entrepreneurs.bio: Key member and co-founder of the House of X content collective.

entrepreneurs.name: Ankush Grover
entrepreneurs.bio: Co-founder and former CEO of Rebel Foods, a global leader in internet restaurants and cloud kitchens.

entrepreneurs.name: Anmol Singh Jaggi
entrepreneurs.bio: Co-founder and CEO of Gensol Engineering, a prominent player in the solar energy and engineering consulting sector.

entrepreneurs.name: Arjun Juneja
entrepreneurs.bio: Chief Operating Officer (COO) of Mankind Pharma, a leading Indian pharmaceutical company.

entrepreneurs.name: Arun Vinayak
entrepreneurs.bio: Co-founder and CEO of Exponent Energy, creating rapid charging solutions for electric vehicles.

entrepreneurs.name: Deepak Chahar
entrepreneurs.bio: Indian cricketer and co-founder of JCDC Sports, a sports management and training venture.

entrepreneurs.name: Devansh Jain
entrepreneurs.bio: Executive Director of INOXGFL Group, a major industrial gases and chemicals conglomerate.

entrepreneurs.name: Harshad Reddy
entrepreneurs.bio: Director of Group Oncology at Apollo Hospitals, leading initiatives in cancer care.

entrepreneurs.name: G Sathya
entrepreneurs.bio: Founder of Techvoyager, a technology services and consulting firm.

entrepreneurs.name: M Revathi
entrepreneurs.bio: Founder of Magnitudo Technologies, focusing on software development and IT solutions.

entrepreneurs.name: Madhu Nachammai
entrepreneurs.bio: Founder of The Thenus, an ethnic wear and fashion brand.

entrepreneurs.name: Ananya Birla
entrepreneurs.bio: Founder of Svatantra Microfin, a microfinance institution empowering women entrepreneurs in rural India.

entrepreneurs.name: Prajal Regmi
entrepreneurs.bio: Founder of Ripra Clothing, a contemporary streetwear and fashion brand.

entrepreneurs.name: Rhea Singh
entrepreneurs.bio: Co-founder of GreenCharge, developing infrastructure for electric vehicle charging stations.

entrepreneurs.name: Priya Joshi
entrepreneurs.bio: Co-founder of GreenCharge, working on sustainable energy solutions for transportation.

entrepreneurs.name: Ritesh Agarwal
entrepreneurs.bio: Founder and CEO of OYO Rooms, one of the world's fastest-growing hospitality chains.

entrepreneurs.name: Bhavish Aggarwal
entrepreneurs.bio: Co-founder and CEO of Ola Cabs, India's largest ride-hailing service, and Krutrim AI.

entrepreneurs.name: Divyank Turakhia
entrepreneurs.bio: Serial entrepreneur who sold his ad-tech company Media.net for $900 million, one of the largest tech exits.

entrepreneurs.name: Suhas Gopinath
entrepreneurs.bio: Became the world's youngest CEO at 14, founding Globals Inc., an IT services company.

entrepreneurs.name: Trishneet Arora
entrepreneurs.bio: Founder and CEO of TAC Security, a leading cybersecurity firm and author of books on ethical hacking.

entrepreneurs.name: Falguni Nayar
entrepreneurs.bio: Left a lucrative banking career to start Nykaa, which became a multi-billion dollar beauty e-commerce giant. (Included for inspirational context)

entrepreneurs.name: Vidit Aatrey
entrepreneurs.bio: Co-founder and CEO of Meesho, a platform that enables resellers to start businesses via social media.

entrepreneurs.name: Sanjeev Bikhchandani
entrepreneurs.bio: Founder of Info Edge, the parent company of Naukri.com, a pioneer in Indian internet businesses. (Included for inspirational context)

entrepreneurs.name: Nithin Kamath
entrepreneurs.bio: Co-founder and CEO of Zerodha, India's largest discount stockbroker, revolutionizing retail investing.

entrepreneurs.name: Deepinder Goyal
entrepreneurs.bio: Co-founder and CEO of Zomato, a global food delivery and restaurant discovery platform.

entrepreneurs.name: Kunal Bahl
entrepreneurs.bio: Co-founder and CEO of Snapdeal, one of India's largest e-commerce marketplaces.

entrepreneurs.name: Rohit Bansal
entrepreneurs.bio: Co-founder of Snapdeal, building it into a major player in Indian e-commerce.

entrepreneurs.name: Shradha Sharma
entrepreneurs.bio: Founder and CEO of YourStory, India's leading platform for startup and entrepreneur stories.

entrepreneurs.name: Aakriti Shrivastava
entrepreneurs.bio: Co-founder of Pep, a D2C brand focused on modern, sustainable household products.

entrepreneurs.name: Aryan Sharma
entrepreneurs.bio: Co-founder of Pep, building a new-age brand for Indian households.

entrepreneurs.name: Aman Gupta
entrepreneurs.bio: Co-founder and CMO of boAt, a lifestyle brand that became a dominant player in audio wearables and electronics.
